Abstract.Para: Returns a TIFF representation of the given images

Definition.Para: An array containing objects representing bitmap image representations.

ResultDescription.Para: A data object containing a TIFF image representation.

Discussion.Para: This method uses the compression returned by getCompression:factor: (if applicable). If a problem is encountered during generation of the TIFF, this method raises an NSTIFFException or an NSBadBitmapParametersException.

Availability.AvailabilityItem: Available in OS X v10.0 and later.
